note:
Northern UK, left wing, sweary. She/her.

Owned by 4 cats; the cuddly one, the whingy one, the thick one and the one who is a dick.

name: The kinds of things I post
value: Fluff, stuff that amuses me, the occasional sweary rant (which I will put behind a CW).

name: The kind of things I don't post
value: Photos (or at least not often), links to obnoxious shite, anything deliberately designed to upset people.

name: Follow back?
value: Nah, I don't play that. Follow me or don't, I don't mind or care.
